results.title: Inhibition of pyruvate carboxylase reverses metformin resistance by activating AMPK in pancreatic cancer.
results.text_hl: @GENE_PC @GENE_5091 @@@PC@@@ promotes @<m>DISEASE_Anophthalmia_with_pulmonary_hypoplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537768 @@@PDAC@@@ glycolysis, and reducing @GENE_PC @GENE_5091 @@@PC@@@ expression can increase @GENE_PPARGC1A @GENE_83516 @@@PGC1a@@@ expression, activate @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@, and restore @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ sensitivity.

citations.NLM: Liu C, Zhou X, Ju H, Zhang Y. Inhibition of pyruvate carboxylase reverses metformin resistance by activating AMPK in pancreatic cancer. Life Sci. 2023 Aug 15;327():121817. PMID: 37270169
citations.BibTeX: @article{37270169, title={Inhibition of pyruvate carboxylase reverses metformin resistance by activating AMPK in pancreatic cancer.}, author={Liu C and Zhou X and Ju H and Zhang Y}, journal={Life Sci}, volume={327}, pages={121817}}

results.title: The NAMPT Inhibitor FK866 Increases Metformin Sensitivity in Pancreatic Cancer Cells
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ has been shown to inhibit @<m>DISEASE_Anophthalmia_with_pulmonary_hypoplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537768 @@@PDAC@@@ cells growth and survival, both in vitro and in vivo.

citations.NLM: Parisotto M, Vuong-Robillard N, Kalegari P, Meharwade T, Joumier L, Igelmann S, Bourdeau V, Rowell MC, Pollak M, Malleshaiah M, Schmitzer A, Ferbeyre G. The NAMPT Inhibitor FK866 Increases Metformin Sensitivity in Pancreatic Cancer Cells Cancers (Basel). 2022 Nov 14;14(22):. PMID: 36428689

results.title: Metformin in pancreatic cancer treatment: from clinical trials through basic research to biomarker quantification.
results.text_hl: A non-rigorous selection of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ suffering from @<m>DISEASE_Anophthalmia_with_pulmonary_hypoplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537768 @@@PDAC@@@ and often a poor understanding of the biological mechanism of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ coupled with lack of scientific data has led to general statements on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ positive or negative action, another aspect which we highlight in the review.

citations.NLM: Bhaw-Luximon A, Jhurry D. Metformin in pancreatic cancer treatment: from clinical trials through basic research to biomarker quantification. J Cancer Res Clin Oncol. 2016 Oct;142(10):2159-71. PMID: 27160287
